data_notice_text:
Statistics Canada has not yet found any suitable data sources to report on this indicator.
Please contact us if you have any suggestions.
graph_title: Proportions of positions in national and local institutions, including (a) the legislatures; (b) the public service; and (c) the judiciary, compared to national distributions, by sex, age, persons with disabilities and population groups
indicator_name: Proportions of positions in national and local institutions, including (a) the legislatures; (b) the public service; and (c) the judiciary, compared to national distributions, by sex, age, persons with disabilities and population groups

fr.data_notice_text:
Statistique Canada n'a pas encore trouvé de sources de données appropriées pour rendre compte de cet indicateur.
N'hésitez pas à communiquer avec nous pour nous faire part de vos suggestions.
fr.graph_title: Proportions of positions in national and local institutions, including (a) the legislatures; (b) the public service; and (c) the judiciary, compared to national distributions, by sex, age, persons with disabilities and population groups
fr.indicator_name: Proportions of positions in national and local institutions, including (a) the legislatures; (b) the public service; and (c) the judiciary, compared to national distributions, by sex, age, persons with disabilities and population groups
fr.SDG_GOAL: Objectif 16 : Promouvoir l’avènement de sociétés pacifiques et inclusives aux fins du développement durable, assurer l’accès de tous à la justice et mettre en place, à tous les niveaux, des institutions efficaces, responsables et ouvertes à tous
fr.SDG_TARGET: Cible 16.7 : Faire en sorte que le dynamisme, l’ouverture, la participation et la représentation à tous les niveaux caractérisent la prise de décisions
fr.SDG_INDICATOR:
Indicateur 16.7.1 : Répartition des postes dans les institutions nationales et locales, y 
compris : a) les organes législatifs ; b) la fonction publique ; c) les organes judiciaires, 
par rapport à la répartition nationale, par sexe, âge, situation au regard du handicap et 
groupe de population
fr.SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Objectif 16 : Promouvoir l’avènement de sociétés pacifiques et inclusives aux fins du développement durable, assurer l’accès de tous à la justice et mettre en place, à tous les niveaux, des institutions efficaces, responsables et ouvertes à tous
fr.SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Cible 16.7 : Faire en sorte que le dynamisme, l’ouverture, la participation et la représentation à tous les niveaux caractérisent la prise de décisions
fr.SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL:
Indicateur 16.7.1 : Répartition des postes dans les institutions nationales et locales, y 
compris : a) les organes législatifs ; b) la fonction publique ; c) les organes judiciaires, 
par rapport à la répartition nationale, par sexe, âge, situation au regard du handicap et 
groupe de population
fr.un_custodian_agency: Programme des Nations Unies pour le développement (PNUD)
fr.goal_meta_link_text: Métadonnées des objectifs de développement durable des Nations Unies

SDG_GOAL: Goal 16: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
SDG_TARGET: Target 16.7: Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 16.7.1: Proportions of positions (by age group, sex, persons with disabilities and population groups) in public institutions (national and local), including (a) the legislatures; (b) the public service; and (c) the judiciary, compared to national distributions.
STAT_CONC_DEF: This metadata sheet is focused only on the first sub-component of indicator 16.7.1, namely on positions in national legislatures held by individuals of each target population (sex, age, persons with disabilities, and contextually relevant population groups).
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Goal 16: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target 16.7: Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels
SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL:
Indicator 16.7.1: Proportions of positions (by age group, sex, persons with disabilities and population groups) in public institutions (national and local), including (a) the legislatures; (b) the public service; and (c) the judiciary, compared to national distributions.

This metadata is for sub-component (a) of the indicator, on legislatures.
goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata
